definitions: a person or company that builds, designs, or makes something

examples.text: the country's biggest constructor of naval vessels
the road constructors faced the difficulty of rocky ground, difficult to dig
he had a brief but not unsuccessful couple of years in auto racing, both as a constructor and a driver

shortDefinitions: person or company that builds something

definitions: a subroutine designed to create an object in a particular class

examples.text: I want to initialize the default constructor
